subject: Stanley Cup
Cable Television
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Games 3 and 4 of the Stanley Cup finals were relegated to cable on the NBC Sports Network, a channel that can be hard for some fans to locate on their cable systems.
